aboutMe.title: Who Am I?
aboutMe.desc1: Hi Everyone, I am Dlee from Can Tho, VietNam.
aboutMe.desc2: I am currently a Frontend Dev.
aboutMe.desc3: I have completed Bachelor's degree in Software Engineer at Can Tho University (CTU).
